title: Jr. One Bedroom! Rehabbed Unit! Great Price!
posting_body: Call Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for reference #2155417.
MUCH Larger than a studio but not quite a full size one bedroom and yes it does have a separate sleeping bedroom area!
Enjoy a totally gut-rehabbed apartment with a modern kitchen and gleaming hardwood floors!
Located in Chicago's popular Wrigleyville neighborhood just south of Irving Park, this unit is located just four blocks from the ballpark and all of the action!
With the Red Line “El” on the next corner and the beautiful lakefront just a short stroll away, you will find the best shopping, dining, and nightlife right at your fingertips.
This unit has beautiful hardwood floors, a spacious layout and walk in closets!
Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2155417
